p: The RT-qPCR assay was performed using the SuperScript® III Platinum® One-Step RT-qPCR Kit (ThermoFisher Scientific, Waltham, MA, USA) and the primers and probes used for detection of DENV, ZIKV, and CHIKV [ 49, 50, 51]. The reaction was performed on the 7500 Fast real-time PCR thermocycler (ThermoFisher Scientific, Waltham, MA, USA) in a final volume of 25 μL.
